title: Verde-Paw
description: Website for Verde-Paw.  Organic green  plants for your pets

home.title: Welcome to Verde Paw
home.description: We grow plants for pets locally in Singapore and the US.  We sell to both retail and wholesale customers and will arrange delivery directly to your home or office.  Our primary goal is to help our merchants grow their business with innovative products driving both revenue and repeat visits by interested customers
